targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  active_connections::float AS active,
  idle_connections::float AS idle,
  max_connections::float AS max
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  COALESCE((active_connections + idle_connections)::float / NULLIF(max_connections, 0) * 100, 0) AS utilization
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 minute'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  COALESCE(buffer_hit_ratio * 100, 0) AS hit_ratio
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 minute'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

WITH deltas AS (
  SELECT
    time,
    xact_commit - LAG(xact_commit) OVER (ORDER BY time) AS commits,
    xact_rollback - LAG(xact_rollback) OVER (ORDER BY time) AS rollbacks
  FROM pg_metrics
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
)
SELECT time, commits::float, rollbacks::float
FROM deltas
WHERE commits IS NOT NULL AND commits >= 0
ORDER BY time

WITH deltas AS (
  SELECT
    time,
    tup_inserted - LAG(tup_inserted) OVER (ORDER BY time) AS inserts,
    tup_updated - LAG(tup_updated) OVER (ORDER BY time) AS updates,
    tup_deleted - LAG(tup_deleted) OVER (ORDER BY time) AS deletes,
    tup_fetched - LAG(tup_fetched) OVER (ORDER BY time) AS fetches
  FROM pg_metrics
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
)
SELECT time, inserts::float, updates::float, deletes::float, fetches::float
FROM deltas
WHERE inserts IS NOT NULL AND inserts >= 0
ORDER BY time

WITH deltas AS (
  SELECT
    time,
    seq_scan - LAG(seq_scan) OVER (ORDER BY time) AS seq_scans,
    idx_scan - LAG(idx_scan) OVER (ORDER BY time) AS idx_scans
  FROM pg_metrics
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
)
SELECT time, seq_scans::float, idx_scans::float
FROM deltas
WHERE seq_scans IS NOT NULL AND seq_scans >= 0
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time,
  dead_tuples::float AS dead_tuples
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time,
  locks_total::float AS locks
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time,
  buffer_hit_ratio AS hit_ratio
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Buffer Cache Hit Ratio Over Time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT total_rows
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 minute'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT total_table_bytes + total_index_bytes + total_toast_bytes AS total_storage
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 minute'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT hypertable_count
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 minute'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT chunk_count
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 minute'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time,
  total_table_bytes::float AS table_bytes,
  total_index_bytes::float AS index_bytes,
  total_toast_bytes::float AS toast_bytes
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time,
  total_rows::float AS rows
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time,
  total_hypertable_bytes::float AS total_size
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT active_connections || ' / ' || max_connections AS connections
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 minute'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT total_hypertable_bytes
FROM pg_metrics
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 minute'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT table_name,
       table_size_bytes::float AS "Table",
       index_size_bytes::float AS "Index"
FROM pg_metrics_per_table
WHERE time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM pg_metrics_per_table)
ORDER BY table_size_bytes DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT table_name AS "Table",
       n_live_tup AS "Live Rows",
       n_dead_tup AS "Dead Rows",
       ROUND(n_dead_tup::numeric / NULLIF(n_live_tup + n_dead_tup, 0) * 100, 2) AS "Dead %"
FROM pg_metrics_per_table
WHERE time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM pg_metrics_per_table)
ORDER BY n_dead_tup DESC

SELECT time, table_name, table_size_bytes::float AS size
FROM pg_metrics_per_table
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT time, table_name, n_live_tup::float AS rows
FROM pg_metrics_per_table
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Row Counts per Table Over Time
